ThirdPersonTargettingMatrix Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class is a MatrixProvider that produces the 1.8 style of targetting matrix.

This matrix is calculated as being the current camera matrix, moved towards a source point along the z-axis of the camera.
